category: Physical environment; Operations and service delivery; Hardware, software or communications equipment and facilities
name: Loss of other third-party services
description: Other third-party services that the repository relies upon suffer disruption.
notes:
- Does the repository sub-contract any of its repository activities?
- Does the repository rely upon any other third-party services such as cleaning or catering? 

The full description of this risk has been obtained from examples provided in DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment, March 2007, Digital Curation Centre (DCC) and Digital Preservation Europe (DPE), http://www.repositoryaudit.eu/
preMitigationNotes:
- The web hosting company serving the repository’s information dissemination systems goes out of business
- Repository's catering company takes industrial action and staff are unable to receive meals
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Establish service level agreements or service commitments with third-party provider In the event of risk’s execution:
- Establish internal means to nullify disruption wherever possible
identifiedBy: DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment
